DownloadImagesAsync(string[], int, bool, CancellationToken)

Downloads images asynchronously.

Declaration
public override Task<List<DapiImageObject>> DownloadImagesAsync(string[] tags, int page, bool isExplicit = false, CancellationToken cancel = default)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string[] tags

An array of tags for filtering images.
int page

The page number of the results.
bool isExplicit

Indicates whether explicit content is allowed.
CancellationToken cancel

A cancellation token that can be used to cancel the operation.
Returns
Type Description
Task<List<DapiImageObject>>

A task representing the asynchronous operation, containing a list of images of type DapiImageObject.
